verbs.description: President Trump [V: will] award the Medal of Honor to a Navy warrior who led a 2002 firefight and rescue mission atop a mountain in Afghanistan .
[ARG0: President Trump] [ARGM-MOD: will] [V: award] [ARG1: the Medal of Honor] [ARG2: to a Navy warrior who led a 2002 firefight and rescue mission atop a mountain in Afghanistan] .
President Trump will award the Medal of Honor to [ARG0: a Navy warrior] [R-ARG0: who] [V: led] [ARG1: a 2002 firefight and rescue mission] [ARGM-LOC: atop a mountain in Afghanistan] .
